Title: Establishes an abatement and exemption from real property taxes for capital improvements to reduce carbon emissions
Summary: Establishes an abatement and exemption from real property taxes for capital improvements to reduce carbon emissions in cities with a population of one million or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to establishing an abatement and exemption from real property taxes for capital improvements to reduce carbon emissions; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
